thread.title: Man Utd transfer news: Ivan Perisic would fit in perfectly, says Dario Simic | Metro News
thread.title_full: Man Utd transfer news: Ivan Perisic would fit in perfectly, says Dario Simic | Metro News

author: Coral Barry For Metro.Co.Uk
title: Man Utd transfer news: Ivan Perisic would fit in perfectly, says Dario Simic | Metro News
text:
Follow us Chelsea and Arsenal transfer target Ivan Perisic would fit in perfectly at Manchester United, says Dario Simic Coral Barry for Metro.co.uk Wednesday 15 Feb 2017 9:02 am Ivan Perisic is reported to be an Arsenal and Chelsea target (Picture: Getty) 
Ivan Perisic would be a formidable addition to Manchester United’s ranks, according to Croatian legend Dario Simic. ‘How can Gibbs be captain?!’ Man Utd legend Roy Keane TEARS into Arsenal flops 
The Inter Milan winger has consistently delivered assists and goals in the past four seasons and has long been tipped with a move to the Premier League. 
Arsenal , Chelsea and Liverpool have been credited with an interest in Perisic, but his fellow compatriot believes he is best suited to United. 
‘I expected him to leave for a big European club in the last transfer window,’ Simic told TMW. Perisic's record 7 goals & 6 assists – 28 appearances 2015/16 season 10 goals & 6 assists – 40 appearances 2014/15 season 7 goals & 9 assists – 35 appearances Perisic has carried his Wolfsburg form to Inter Milan (Picture: Getty) 
‘He has the class to play [at the top]. 
‘I could see him doing well at Manchester United.’ 
Perisic has scored seven goals this season as well as providing six assists from the left wing. Arsene Wenger has been linked with a move for Perisic (Picture: Getty)
